about_the_game:
In The Route you play as a ball traveling down a road, the road is randomly generated and can turn, slope up, down, right,left and more.
it's up to you to use A and D to turn to the sides, space and shift to jump and dash down again, Q and E to rotate 45 degrees left or right, or w and s to go faster or slower,
the road is divided into "speed segments" at the beginning of each speed segment is a speed sign and after passing it the speed will increase by 25km/h
the game continues all the way up to 10 speed segments or 1000 path segment.
the goal is to get as much score as possible to get onto the leaderboard, you get score based on how many km/h you're traveling and how many km you have traveled, you also gain 1 3rd of your score extra if you can land inside of the end house at the end of the road.
